column1: Every word is a chain, every name a spell.  Hermetic Maxim
The hand above commands; the hand below obeys.  Alchemical Aphorism
Tools are bones stolen from the gods.  Occult Fragment
He who commands the elements must first sacrifice himself to them.  Mystical Saying
Power is illusion perfected into truth.  Esoteric Fragment
The Magicianâ€™s coin shows one face to heaven and another to the grave.  Arcane Proverb
